title: Major Dependency Update & Tailwind CSS 4.x Migration
description: Complete dependency update to latest versions including React 19, React Router 7, Tailwind CSS 4, Vite 7, Mongoose 9, Express 5, and Zod 4. Full codebase migration to Tailwind CSS 4.x syntax with new utility classes and configuration.

changes.description: Dependencies: Updated React to v19.2.3 with new useRef requirements
Dependencies: Updated React Router to v7.10.1 with removed deprecated future flags
Dependencies: Updated Tailwind CSS to v4.1.18 with new @theme directive
Dependencies: Updated Vite to v7.3.0 with new environment typings
Dependencies: Updated Zustand to v5.0.9 (API compatible)
Dependencies: Updated Mongoose to v9.x (API compatible)
Dependencies: Updated Express to v5.x (API compatible)
Dependencies: Updated Zod to v4.2.0 (API compatible)
Dependencies: Updated all 60+ packages to latest versions
Tailwind: Migrated from @tailwind directives to @import \"tailwindcss\"
Tailwind: Added @theme block for custom shadows, animations, fonts
Tailwind: Converted all @apply directives to plain CSS
Tailwind: Updated bg-gradient-to-* to bg-linear-to-* (510 occurrences)
Tailwind: Updated opacity syntax /[0.xx] to /xx format
Tailwind: Updated CSS variable syntax [var(--x)] to (--x)
Tailwind: Updated flex-shrink-0 to shrink-0 globally
Tailwind: Updated z-[xx] to z-xx pattern globally
Tailwind: Updated rounded-[2rem] to rounded-4xl
Tailwind: Updated bg-(--color-surface) to bg-surface
PostCSS: Changed to @tailwindcss/postcss for Tailwind 4.x
Dashboard: New CommandsPage with category sections and search
